templates.name: Node.js Developer Application
templates.subject: Node.js Developer with Expertise in TypeScript & MySQL â€“ Application
templates.body:
Hello,

I am excited to apply for the Node.js Backend Developer position. With 1 year of experience in building scalable, high-performance backend systems using Node.js, TypeScript, and MySQL, I believe I can add immediate value to your development team.

**Here's how I can contribute:**

- **API Development:** Designed and developed APIs to support dynamic, data-driven applications.
- **Database Optimization:** Optimized complex MySQL queries, reducing database latency.
- **System Integration:** Seamlessly integrated front-end applications with backend systems, enhancing overall user experience.
- **Scalability:** Developed scalable solutions capable of handling high-traffic applications.
- **Team Collaboration:** Worked closely with cross-functional teams to ensure efficient project delivery.

I am passionate about developing robust and user-friendly applications and am eager to bring this expertise to your team.

I have attached my resume for your review and would welcome the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to your team.

Best regards,

Hiren Chavda

Mobile: +91 7016801492
Email: hirenchavda141@gmail.com
Resume: [View Resume](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1VBN-Q-vjEMgSVibKRPvuqMjtWKfwBpEB/view?usp=sharing)
